intent_atoms.description: Add NestedA11yIDs identifiers to the annotation note edit, save, cancel, and delete controls so QA automation can target them deterministically across platforms.
Annotation note toolbar buttons expose stable `.nestedAccessibilityIdentifier` values for edit, save, cancel, and delete actions.
Identifier constants live alongside existing NestedA11yIDs definitions (e.g., in a dedicated `AnnotationAccessibilityID` namespace) with unit coverage similar to other accessibility identifier tests.
Documentation in `Docs/Guides/NestedA11yIDsIntegration.md` lists the new identifiers for QA reference if additional usage notes are required.
Identifier naming follows the no-dot-per-segment rule and mirrors automation semantics (e.g., `annotationNotes.list.row.edit`).

functional_units.name: Annotation Note Edit Button
functional_units.description: UI button that allows users to edit an annotation note

functional_units.name: Annotation Note Save Button
functional_units.description: UI button that saves changes made to an annotation note

functional_units.name: Annotation Note Cancel Button
functional_units.description: UI button that cancels edits on an annotation note
